channel.title: Agl1431
channel.description: What are your thoughts on unbanning him? I'm pretty sure he's been ban evading and proclaiming we all cheat, and sending us all annoying PMs but still - Should he be unbanned?

item.title: Agl1431
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Activity may have gone up, but don’t draw a causal correlation between the two. If anything, it would make more sense other efforts would be the cause that were targeted at growing activity.

Causal is a common flaw in human logic, see: religious miracles and answering of prayers.

Read full topic

item.title: Agl1431
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

It seems like activity went up a bit after Agl came back. May just be me though, idk lol

Read full topic

item.title: Agl1431
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

As Jamie said, ensure he knows that he is treading on a very fine line and if he slips up, the punishment wont be light.

Read full topic

item.title: Agl1431
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I’d say unban him but keep him on strict rules like literally hair line rules any kind of rule breaking will automatically end up in a permanent ban with no chances.

I think the fact that he’s stayed around for so long proves that he really wants to play again, I could be wrong about this as I didn’t know him that well.

Read full topic

item.title: Agl1431
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

He’s interested in coming back, but he says he will not give respect of friendship to me. Ouch, right?

Read full topic

item.title: Agl1431
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Even if you unban him I don’t think he will come back do you?

Read full topic

item.title: Agl1431
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

What name do you think he’s been ban evading with? I’d say we could try and see how it turns out. If he tries to start a fight, grief, etc then ban him again. Warn him of this though before you unban him.

Read full topic
